body:
Thanks Chris. This is annoying when it happens ... (loosing the reply). When the response is long i usually copy it , just in case ... :-)

As i said i normally download the github package and drop all of it in the UserLibrary. Then i see what items were changed and what wasn't. In this way i noticed the ones i mentioned.

The last 2 i've not used before, so no particular interest for me. The first one, i do use. I didn't check that the name changed. So sorry for calling this alarm.

Thanks again,

-A.
